overview:
They have the fastest growing technology in the country. Their iPad kiosk enclosures are patent pending and have a design unlike the rest.

Action Kiosks is located in Springville, Utah. They have over 10 years of design and manufacturing experience. In just six months, they have increased their product design 10 fold and are continuing to come out with new products every month.

Action Kiosks sales products all over the world. Some of the biggest areas of interest include Canada, United States, and Europe. Although They have products designed for large companies, their pricing is still very competitive and cannot be beat. Since they manufacture our products in-house, they’re able to keep the pricing very low.
